t: Why Amazon just spent more than $8 billion on MGM | CNN Business
s: May 26, 2021 - Amazon built a robot for your home. And it can beatbox. ... MGM, a classic Hollywood brand synonymous with “The Wizard of Oz” and Leo the roaring lion, was purchased for $8.45 billion on Wednesday by Amazon (AMZN), a company currently valued at nearly $1.7 trillion.
